name: Astana-Baiterek
description: «Astana-Baiterek» Monument: Enjoy a panoramic view of the entire city from a bird's-eye view, feel its beauty and scale.

name: Ailand
description: «Ailand» Family Recreation Center: Oceanarium, jungle, Ferris wheel and other entertainment attractions for the whole family.

name: Boat station on the Embankment
description: Boat station on the Embankment (Zheltoksan 2/2): Feel the wind of freedom on the water, enjoying the beautiful views of the Waterfront and the surrounding landscape.

name: Khan Shatyr
description: «Khan Shatyr» Shopping Center: Take a look into the world of shopping and entertainment, plunge into the atmosphere of modern trade and recreation.

name: Arc de Triomphe
description: Arc de Triomphe: Feel the grandeur and significance of this historical symbol of the city while enjoying its majestic view.

name: Nur Alem
description: «Nur Alem» Museum of the Future (Expo): Discover the amazing world of science, technology and innovation presented in this futuristic museum.

name: The Grand Mosque
description: Visit the biggest Mosque in Central Asia! Make sure to wear clothes that do not reveal your body and have something to cover your hair.

name: Ak Orda
description: Walk by the Ak Orda Presidential Palace of Astana.

name: Palace of Peace and Reconciliation
description: You will get a chance to take a look at an engineering marvel created by a British Achitect - Norman Foster.

name: National Museum
description: Discover Kazakhstan's history starting all the way from paleonthological period up to modern day Kazakhstan

name: The State Theatre of Opera
description: Take a look at the modern Theatre of Opera and Ballet in Astana! The State Theatre of Opera and Ballet Astana is not always open for visit.

name: Atyrau Bridge
description: A fascinating product of creative engineering - a bridge that resembles Sturgeon's shape - symbol of Atyrau city!

name: Ozen
description: A great place to enjoy an impeccably mixed cocktail, freshly brewed coffee or a light meal. Make yourself at home and rest in one of the seating groups.

name: Saksaul
description: Familiarity with Kazakh and modern kitchen. Unique the national restaurant, where the food is prepared on open fire: in the tandoor, grill and cauldron.

name: Daididau
description: Daididau is a restaurant that shares a passion for Kazakh music and culinary art.

name: Line Brew
description: This is one of several Line Brews in Astana. This is a Kazakh chain of brewpubs and steakhouses.

name: Arnau
description: This restaurant is a best place which presents a typical Kazak food in Astana. The menu will give you a time deciding on what to order.

name: Riba Pila
description: There aren't enough food, service, value or atmosphere ratings for Riba Pila yet.

name: Zina
description: The food is too good! Do yourself a favour and dine here. Every dish is a perfection itself. I highly recommend this place if you are in Astana

name: Satti
description: Authentic Kazakh cuisine mixed with European dishes, Italian specialties, and the only ethnic show program in town make this restaurant a real Astana Landmark.
